short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun way to engage audiences with a live instagram feed! No API limits! Example: https://www.instagram.com/explore/tags/love/

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your favourite hashtags into a beautiful scrolling presentation for events For FREE! Showcase live hashtag posts for your events and engage your audience more.

With a premium 1 time payment, gain control of time between switching presentation, and number of posts to scroll through before resetting.

HOW TO RUN:
1. Pin the extension so it's visible in the extension shortcuts
2. Click extension to open
3. Type in a hashtag and search! That's it! 

UPDATES:
1. App's basic features are now Free to use!
